verses.verse: It is a trustworthy <S%G4103><s%> statement: <S%G3056><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G5100><s%> aspires <S%G3713><s%> to the office <S%G1984><s%> of overseer, <S%G1984><s%> it is a fine <S%G2570><s%> work <S%G2041><s%> he desires <S%G1937><s%> [to do.]

An overseer, <S%G1985><s%> then, <S%G3767><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be above <S%G423><s%> reproach, <S%G423><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> temperate, <S%G3524><s%> prudent, <S%G4998><s%> respectable, <S%G2887><s%> hospitable, <S%G5382><s%> able <S%G1317><s%> to teach, <S%G1317><s%>

not addicted <S%G3943><s%> to wine <S%G3943><s%> or <S%G3361><s%> pugnacious, <S%G4131><s%> but gentle, <S%G1933><s%> uncontentious, <S%G269><s%> free <S%G866><s%> from the love <S%G866><s%> of money. <S%G866><s%>

[He must be] one who manages <S%G4291><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> household <S%G3624><s%> well, <S%G2573><s%> keeping <S%G2192><s%> his children <S%G5043><s%> under <S%G1722><s%> control <S%G5292><s%> with all <S%G3956><s%> dignity <S%G4587><s%>

(but if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> does not know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G3609><s%> to manage <S%G4291><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> household, <S%G3624><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> will he take <S%G1959><s%> care <S%G1959><s%> of the church <S%G1577><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?);

[and] not a new <S%G3504><s%> convert, <S%G3504><s%> lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> he become conceited <S%G5187><s%> and fall <S%G1706><s%> into the condemnation <S%G2917><s%> incurred by the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

And he must <S%G1163><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> reputation <S%G3141><s%> with those <S%G3588><s%> outside <S%G1855><s%> [the church,] so <S%G2443><s%> that he may not fall <S%G1706><s%> into reproach <S%G3680><s%> and the snare <S%G3803><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

Deacons <S%G1249><s%> likewise <S%G5615><s%> [must be] men <S%G4586><s%> of dignity, <S%G4586><s%> not double-tongued, or <S%G3361><s%> addicted <S%G4337><s%> to much <S%G4183><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> or <S%G3361><s%> fond <S%G146><s%> of sordid <S%G146><s%> gain, <S%G146><s%>
[but] holding <S%G2192><s%> to the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the faith <S%G4102><s%> with a clear <S%G2513><s%> conscience. <S%G4893><s%>

And let these <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> first <S%G4413><s%> be tested; <S%G1381><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> let them serve <S%G1247><s%> as deacons <S%G1247><s%> if they are beyond <S%G410><s%> reproach. <S%G410><s%>

Women <S%G1135><s%> [must] likewise <S%G5615><s%> [be] dignified, <S%G4586><s%> not malicious <S%G1228><s%> gossips, <S%G1228><s%> but temperate, <S%G3524><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things. <S%G3956><s%>

Let deacons <S%G1249><s%> be husbands <S%G435><s%> of [only] one <S%G1520><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> [and] good <S%G2573><s%> managers <S%G4291><s%> of [their] children <S%G5043><s%> and their own <S%G2398><s%> households. <S%G3624><s%>

For those <S%G3588><s%> who have served <S%G1247><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> as deacons <S%G1247><s%> obtain <S%G4046><s%> for themselves <S%G1438><s%> a high <S%G2570><s%> standing <S%G898><s%> and great <S%G4183><s%> confidence <S%G3954><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%> that is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
I am writing <S%G1125><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> to you, hoping <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to you before <S%G5035><s%> long; <S%G5035><s%>

but in case <S%G1437><s%> I am <S%G1019><s%> delayed, <S%G1019><s%> [I write] so <S%G2443><s%> that you may know <S%G3609><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> one ought <S%G1163><s%> to conduct <S%G390><s%> himself in the household <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is the church <S%G1577><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the pillar <S%G4769><s%> and support <S%G1477><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

And by common <S%G3672><s%> confession <S%G3672><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> is the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of godliness: <S%G2150><s%> He who <S%G3739><s%> was revealed <S%G5319><s%> in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> Was vindicated <S%G1344><s%> in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> Beheld <S%G3708><s%> by angels, <S%G32><s%> Proclaimed <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the nations, <S%G1484><s%> Believed <S%G4100><s%> on in the world, <S%G2889><s%> Taken <S%G353><s%> up in glory. <S%G1391><s%>
